name: Fragility
description: The target loses its Base Damage Negate and suffers a power penalty to its Fortitude.

name: Dismantle
description: The targets begins to disassemble. Once the spell is cast, the deconstruction takes a 1 minute per point of Presence.

name: Destroy Intensity
description: Make an Offensive Roll against the target. On a hit, the target must make a SR Check. A target can choose to fail the Resistance Check. A natural source of an element automatically fails the Resistance Check.

description.name: DoS 1+
entries: The target is not affected.

description.name: DoF 1+
entries: The target loses intensities of Heat, Cold, or Electricity. If the target is an elemental, it instead loses 5 Life Points per intensity destroyed.

name: Minor Destruction
description: Make an Offensive Roll against the target. On a hit, the target must make a SR Check. A target can choose to fail the Resistance Check.

description.name: DoS 1+
entries: The target is not affected.

description.name: DoF 1+
entries: The target loses 1 quality, as if it failed a Breakage Check.

name: Spheres of Destruction
description: Make an Offensive Roll against a target for each sphere. On a hit, a target takes Force Damage -- Base Damage 3. You must choose all targets before making any roll but you can target the same entity with multiple spheres.

name: Increase Weakness
description: Make an Offensive Roll against the target. On a hit, the target must make a SR Check. A target can choose to fail the Resistance Check.

description.name: DoS 1+
entries: The spell ends.

description.name: DoF 1+
entries: The target doubles any Damage Vulnerabilities or Damage Weakness it possess. For example, a light elemental with a Damage Weakness to Darkness suffers fours times the final damage from Darkness attacks, instead of the normal double. The target can repeat the Resistance Check on the End Phase after they take damage from a Vulnerability or Weakness.

name: Spell Destruction
description: You can cast this spell when another spell configuration is cast but before any dice are rolled. You reduce the mana available to the triggering spell configuration. If this reduces the spell's accumulated mana below the Mana Cost, the spell fizzles and the mana is lost.
The caster can choose to reallocate mana as the following:

items: The caster can remove principles that increase the Mana Cost.
The caster can reduce the spell's degree to reduce the Mana Cost.
If the spell was cast from a mass of mana, the caster can add additional mana.

name: Aggravate Damage
description: You can cast this spell when an attack is declared but before any dice are rolled. The triggering attack gains a deed bonus to its Base Damage.

name: Destruction of Phenom
description: You can cast this spell when a phenom is manifested but before Projection is rolled. You nullify that phenom if its final roll for Potential is no greater than the listed degree.

name: Wound
description: Make an Offensive Roll against the target. On a hit, the target must make a SR Check. A target can choose to fail the Resistance Check.

description.name: DoS 1+
entries: The target is not affected.

description.name: DoF 1+
entries: The target takes atomic damage equal to a percentage of their current Life Points, round down.

name: Destroy Ki
description: Make an Offensive Roll against the target. On a hit, the target must make a SR Check. A target can choose to fail the Resistance Check.

description.name: DoS 1+
entries: The target is not affected.

description.name: DoF 1+
entries: The target loses 10 Ki per Degree of Failure from their Ki Reserve.

name: Produce Damage
description: Make an Offensive Roll against the target. On a hit, the target must make a SR Check. A target can choose to fail the Resistance Check.

description.name: DoS 1+
entries: The target is not affected.

description.name: DoF 1+
entries: The target takes Atomic Damage. If the target has the Rex Damage Role, multiple the final damage by their Rex Multiplier.

name: Destruction of Senses
description: Make an Offensive Roll against the target. On a hit, the target must make a SR Check. A target can choose to fail the Resistance Check.

description.name: DoS 1+
entries: The spell ends.

description.name: DoF 1+
entries: The target loses their ability to use one of their senses, your choice.

name: Mystic Bolt
description: Make an Offensive Roll against an entity. On a hit, the target takes Force Damage.

name: Unravel Ties
description: Make an Offensive Roll against the target. On a hit, the target must make a SR Check. A target can choose to fail the Resistance Check. If the target is a controlled creature, the conjurer makes the Resistance Check.

description.name: DoS 1+
entries: The target is not affected.

description.name: DoF 1+
entries: If the target has used Control to control one or more creatures, one control breaks per Degree of Failure. If the target was instead a controlled creature, the control ends on just that creature.

name: Destroy Resistance
description: Make an Offensive Roll against the target. On a hit, the target must make a SR Check. A target can choose to fail the Resistance Check.

description.name: DoS 1+
entries: The spell ends.

description.name: DoF 1+
entries: The target suffers a power penalty to their Resistance Checks equal to their Degree of Failure. The target can repeat the Resistance Check on the End Phase after they make a Resistance Check. The new Resistance Check is made without applying the power penalty from this spell.

name: Undo State
description: Make one Offensive Roll against all targets. On a hit, a target must make a SR or MR Check. A target can choose to fail the Resistance Check.

description.name: DoS 1+
entries: The target is not affected.

description.name: DoF 1+
entries: The target removes all of the following states:

items: Pain, not caused by a Critical
Rage, Fear, Fascinated, Confused, Stunned, and Charmed

name: Dome of Destruction
description: Make one Offensive Roll against all targets. On a hit, a target takes Force Damage.

name: Zone of Decay
description: The first time an entity enters the zone or if it starts its turn in the zone, they must make a SR Check. You are affect by this spell and you cannot select targets, no matter what other powers allow, all entities are affected equally.

description.name: DoS 1+
entries: The target is not affected this round.

description.name: DoF 1+
entries: The target takes atomic damage equal to 10% of their total Life Points, round down.

name: Zone of Destruction
description: The first time an entity enters the zone or if it starts its turn in the zone (or touches the targeted object), they must make a SR Check. You are affect by this spell and you cannot select targets, no matter what other powers allow, all entities are affected equally.

description.name: DoS 1+
entries: The target is not affected this round.

description.name: DoF 1+
entries: The target takes 10 atomic damage per Degree of Failure. If the target uses the Rex Damage Role, the final damage is multiplied by their Rex Multiplier.

name: Destroy Memories
description: Make one Offensive Roll against all targets. On a hit, a target must make a SR or MR Check. A target can choose to fail the Resistance Check. Before the target makes the Resistance Check, you must have an idea of what memory to destroy. For example, in order to destroy the memory of a childhood friend, you need the name of the friend. If the memory is core to the nature of the target, the Resistance Check is reduced by 6 points.

description.name: DoS 1+
entries: The target is not affected.

description.name: DoF 1+
entries: The target has the chosen memories destroyed. The target can repeat the Resistance Check when given reason to doubt their memory.

name: Block Development
description: Make an Offensive Roll against the target. On a hit, the target must make a SR or MR Check. A target can choose to fail the Resistance Check.

description.name: DoS 1+
entries: The spell ends.

description.name: DoF 1+
entries: The target cannot invest Experience Points, Phenom Points, Spirit Knowledge, Mana Knowledge, or Phenom Knowledge. The target can repeat the Resistance Check after one day has passed.

name: Forbid
description: Make one Offensive Roll against all targets. On a hit, a target must make a SR or MR Check. A target can choose to fail the Resistance Check. Before the target rolls the Resistance Check, you must choose an Active action or a broad type of action, such as moving. You cannot choose an action that would put the target in danger. If the forbidden action is too broad, like talking, the Resistance Check is reduced by 4 points.

description.name: DoS 1+
entries: The spell ends.

description.name: DoF 1+
entries: The target is unable to perform the chosen actions. The target can repeat the Resistance Check on the End Phase after a number of minutes have passed equal to their Degree of Failure

name: Suppress Power
description: Make one Offensive Roll against all targets. On a hit, a target must make a SR Check. A target can choose to fail the Resistance Check.

description.name: DoS 1+
entries: The spell ends.

description.name: DoF 1+
entries: The target is unable to use any power or supernatural feature. The target can repeat the Resistance Check on the End Phase after a number of rounds have passed equal to their Degree of Failure

name: Greater Mystic Bolt
description: You make an Offensive Roll against the target. On a hit, the target takes Force Damage.

name: Destroy Volition
description: Make one Offensive Roll against all targets. On a hit, a target must make a SR or MR Check. A target can choose to fail the Resistance Check.

description.name: DoS 1+
entries: The target is not affected.

description.name: DoF 1+
entries: The target cannot perform Active actions unless they would be in danger by not doing so. For example, a target would be able to move out of a burning building.

name: Zone of Weakness
description: The first time an entity enters the zone or if it starts its turn in the zone, they must make a SR Check. A target can choose to fail the Resistance Check. You are affect by this spell and you cannot select targets, no matter what other powers allow, all entities are affected equally.

description.name: DoS 1+
entries: The target is immune to this spell for one day.

description.name: DoF 1+
entries: The target gain Damage Weakness to all damage and their entire body counts as a Vulnerable Point. Structures also lose their Base Damage Negate and suffer a -5 deed penalty to Fortitude. The target can repeat the Resistance Check after one day has passed.

name: Destructive Form
description: The target gains Base Damage Negate 100 which can be overcome by an Imbued attack. Any other entity that comes into contact with the target must make a SR Check or take 10 atomic damage per Degree of Failure.

name: Death
description: Make an Offensive Roll against the target. On a hit, the target must make a PrR or SR Check. A target can choose to fail the Resistance Check.

description.name: DoS 1+
entries: The target is not affected.

description.name: DoF 1+
entries: A psychopomp appears next to the target and claims their spirit. If the target beats the psychopomp, their spirit returns to their body immediately. Death's desire for the target remains unchanged since the psychompomp was not called on true terms.

name: Devouring Zone
description: The first time an entity enters the zone or if it starts its turn in the zone, it must make a PhR or SR Check. You are affect by this spell and you cannot select targets, no matter what other powers allow, all entities are affected equally.

description.name: DoS 1+
entries: The target is immune to this spell for one day.

description.name: DoF 1+
entries: The target reduces their Presence by half a point and suffers a -1 all-action ppenalty The target is then immune to this spell for one day.

If the target's Presence is reduced to zero, they fade away into nothing. A half value is rounded up for the purpose of final value. The reduced Presence and all-action penalty are restored one point each day the target is not in thee zone.

name: Destroy Experience
description: Make an Offensive Roll against the target. On a hit, the target must make a SR Check.

description.name: DoS 1+
entries: The target is not affected.

description.name: DoF 1+
entries: The target must uninvest XP from Primary or Secondary Skills of your choice. No skill can lose more than half of its invested XP and the target can choose if you choose more than one skill.

name: Sever Existence
description: Make one Offensive Roll against all targets. On a hit, a target must make a PrR or SR Check. This spell is visible on the material plane.

description.name: DoS 1+
entries: The target is not affected.

description.name: DoF 1+
entries: The target stops existing; their spirit is not collected by a psychopomp and does not return to the Nexus.

name: Rain of Destruction
description: Make one Offensive Roll against all targets. On a hit, a target takes force damage. A target that takes any damage must make a SR Check.

description.name: DoS 1+
entries: The target is not affected.

description.name: DoF 1+
entries: The target takes 10 force damage per degree of failure.

name: Destroy Mana
description: A maintained spell of your choice loses an amount of mana. The spell first loses principles that increase the Mana Cost. If the mana cost is still not enough then the degree is reduced. If the mana available is still not enough to meet the Mana Cost, the spell ends.

effect: Affects up to intermediate degree spells
Affects up to advanced degree spells
Affects up to arcane degree spells

name: Sweep from the Heavens
description: Make an Offensive Roll against the target. On a hit, the target must make a SR Check. A target can choose to fail the Resistance Check.

description.name: DoS 1+
entries: The spell ends.

description.name: DoF 1+
entries: The target reduces its Nornir. The target cannot repeat the Resistance Check, the effects last as long as you maintain the spell.

name: Void
description: You create a stationary orb centered on a point of your choice. The orb has its own Initiative Roll of 15 each round. On its turn, the orb makes an Opposed Characteristic Check with Strength 14 against the Strength or Agility Characteristic against all entities within an area around it. A target is pulled 30-feet per Degree of Failure toward the orb.
Any entity in contact with the orb on its turn must make a PhR Check and a SR Check.

A target that fails the PhR Check takes 10 points of Force Damage per Degree of Failure. A target that fails the SR Check loses 10 points of mana from their Mana Pool per Degree of Failure. If the target's Life Points are reduced to zero while in contact with the orb, they are swallowed by the the void and their soul does not return to the Nexus.

name: Greater Destruction
description: A number of objects of your choice whose total Presence is no greater than the listed value are destroyed.

name: Destroy Souls
description: All entities in an area centered on a point of your choice must make a SR Check.
A target that fails the Resistance Check has its spirit destroyed. Their spirit is not collected by a Psychopomp and it does not return to the Nexus.

name: Entropy
description: You create a stationary zone centered on a point of your choice. Reality within the zone is shaken; chaos is the only thing that holds. You can choose to alter a specific aspect of reality or allow the spell to take control. The follow list are examples of what can happen within the zone of Entropy.

items: Invert the weight of things. So a feather weighs a ton while a boulder is as light as a feather.
Lovers hate eachother and enemies fall in love.
Time flows forward in altering tempos.
Icy winds blow off of a tropical storm.
Ice forms when things are on fire, and as things freeze they turn to ash.

description: You have absolutely no control on what this spell does. All entities within the zone are affected, unless they have the listed Nornir.

effect: Affects entities with Nornir 10 or less
Affects entities with Nornir 20 or less
Affects entities with Nornir 30 or less
Affects entities with Nornir 40 or less

name: Uncreation
description: An entity of your choice must make a SR Check. The entity can be anything, such as an entire city, a species, or a single individual.

A target that fails the Resistance Check is deleted, so that it had never existed. Any death caused by the existence of a target returns to life if the spirit still exists. All entities forget a target existed unless the entity has Nornir 40.
